trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som behandler den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelse for en <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Representanten FormsAuthenticationEventHandler er definert for <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>hendelsen for <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>hendelsen til den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>klassen ved 책 angi en underrutine navnet **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** i filen Global.asax for ASP.NET-program.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>bygger en <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>objekt med gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, og sender den til den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>objektet som er angitt for den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** -hendelsen for 책 angi den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>til en egendefinert <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>egenskapen under den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen, identiteten som ble levert av skjemaer godkjenningsbilletten URL-adresse og informasjonskapsel brukes.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: Den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen er bare aktiveres n책r godkjenningen <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>og <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>er en aktive HTTP-modul for applikasjonen.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
